Package org.elasticsearch.xpack.sql.action

package org.elasticsearch.xpack.sql.action
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AbstractSqlQueryRequest
    Base class for requests that contain sql queries (Query and Translate)
    AbstractSqlRequest
    Base request for all SQL-related requests.
    BasicFormatter
    Formats SqlQueryResponse for the CLI and for the TEXT format.
    SqlClearCursorAction
     
    SqlClearCursorRequest
    Request to clean all SQL resources associated with the cursor
    SqlClearCursorRequestBuilder
     
    SqlClearCursorResponse
    Response to the request to clean all SQL resources associated with the cursor
    SqlQueryAction
     
    SqlQueryRequest
    Request to perform an sql query
    SqlQueryRequestBuilder
    The builder to build sql request
    SqlQueryResponse
    Response to perform an sql query
    SqlTranslateAction
    Sql action for translating SQL queries into ES requests
    SqlTranslateRequest
    Request for the sql action for translating SQL queries into ES requests
    SqlTranslateRequestBuilder
    Builder for the request for the sql action for translating SQL queries into ES requests
    SqlTranslateResponse
    Response for the sql action for translating SQL queries into ES requests
